@realDonaldTrump Trump spent OUR tax payer money on a LARGE stockpile of hydroxycholoroquine(29 million doses), a drug that Trump theorized would work. He now shifted to drinking disinfectant. Not including the fact trump has ties to the manufacturer #ExposingthefakePOTUS
